events.message: I received the blender today, but it arrived with a cracked glass jar which makes it unusable.
The reported issue regarding the cracked jar has been categorized as a product defect for further processing.
A customer support agent has been assigned to assist with the defective blender jar replacement.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the cracked jar. I’m here to help you get this resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the damage and confirm if the blender was used before noticing the crack?
I have attached photos showing the crack. I didn’t even use the blender yet; it was damaged straight out of the box.
Thank you for the photos. We will send a replacement jar immediately at no extra cost, and you can keep the defective part for disposal.
That’s great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and the free replacement offer.
We have processed your replacement. You’ll receive a tracking number shortly, and the new jar should arrive within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement jar and that everything is working correctly now.
As we have not heard any further issues, we are closing this case. Please contact us again if you need further assistance.
